title: Singapore Satay
description: A delicious Asian satay marinade and sauce for chicken and beef.
overview: A savory satay marinade with bold flavors from red onion, garlic, lemongrass, and warm spices – perfect for marinating thin chicken breasts.

ingredients.title: Marinade
content: 1 pound skinless boneless chicken breast halves - pounded thin
Salt and black pepper, to taste

stages.title: Step 1
content: In a large nonreactive bowl, stir together the red onion, garlic, lemon grass, soy sauce, peanut oil, turmeric, brown sugar, cumin, ginger, salt, and pepper.
Reserve about 2 tablespoons of this marinade in a small bowl and refrigerate until cooking time.
Add the chicken breasts to the remaining marinade, toss to coat well, and marinate in the refrigerator overnight.

stages.title: Step 2
content: About 30 minutes before serving, soak the bamboo skewers in water. Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil the grate.

stages.title: Step 3
content: Remove the chicken from the bowl and discard the used marinade.
Cut each chicken breast diagonally into 6 long strips, then thread each strip onto a soaked skewer.
Grill the skewers, turning frequently and basting with the reserved marinade, until the chicken is cooked through with brown, crispy edges (approximately 5 to 8 minutes per skewer).
